summary.para: Adds the specified profile to the collection.

param.name: pProfile
param.para: Pointer to an object describing the profile to add.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Finds a profile based on the specified profile ID.

param.name: ProfileId
param.para: Pointer to the The ID of the profile to find.

param.name: ppProfile
param.para: On success, returns a double pointer to the profile.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

param.name: Index
param.para: Index of the profile to retrieve.

param.name: ppProfile
param.para: On success, returns a double pointer to an object that describes the specified sensor profile.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: removes the specified profile based on the specified profile ID.

param.name: ProfileId
param.para: Pointer to the of the profile to remove.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Removes a profile based on the specified index.

param.name: Index
param.para: The index of the profile to remove.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Contains a collection of media foundation sensor profile objects.
